item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. When did estimates turn into deadlines? (81 points | 35 comments)

29. Toshiba stuffs an entire PC into a dot matrix printer – Toshiba Jimucon SJ-9500 (18 points | 5 comments)
